name: Instant-messaging-android-application
body: ### Welcome to Instant Messaging Android Application. Messaging service between android devices. Built this application with Parse server on Amazon EC-2. Application allows users to send and recieve text messages and images. Chat history is stored in the cloud and locally. ### Authors and Contributors Karma Pandya (@karmagamer)'s Personal project. ### Support or Contact You can visit my website. Thank you for viewing my project.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
